title: Attempting to Reconnect not just in League of Legends, but also in other online games.

replies.body: It looks like we've been having another round of login issues since about 9PM last night. We've got people looking into it already, and we'll be sure to update the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) as we get more news!

Woah, this Poro was on his weekend and didn't see these replies until now. If you keep having this issue, it might be smart to step back before queueing back up and possibly getting an LPQ for disconnecting more. Those login issues were cleared up already, and if you're still having problems it's likely centered around your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Try adjusting your ports and DNS using that guide, and if that doesn't help reach out to our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
